channel.title: RonKJeffries tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from RonKJeffries.

item.description: There's so much bad news. Even so, we have this brilliant science. I am humbled, astonished and amazed. Out of 100 BILLION+ planets, who knows what we may discover? https://t.co/C1BFDCL4G9
item.source:markdown: There's so much bad news. Even so, we have this brilliant science. I am humbled, astonished and amazed. Out of 100 BILLION+ planets, who knows what we may discover? https://t.co/C1BFDCL4G9

item.description: @aflink27 We do have cats, plus there's a dog. Fail safe. Tonight is a night I am responsible for dinner. I hope tomorrow i don't report that divorce papers were served shortly after I served this odd dish.
item.source:markdown: @aflink27 We do have cats, plus there's a dog. Fail safe. Tonight is a night I am responsible for dinner. I hope tomorrow i don't report that divorce papers were served shortly after I served this odd dish.

item.description: "We could do what coyotes do..." This bit is not new, but it's new to me, and pretty funny/disturbing. https://t.co/JoOBDothmV
